name: Sustainability is an everyday thing
description:
We often forget the power that is bestowed upon us. This game is a gentle reminder for making a smart, sustainable choices on a everyday basis. This might look very similar to your Tuesday morning, if it does then you've a sweet moment of heroic dance at the end of the game. 

Credits : The media used through the story is from the following sources :

images : individual contributors from unsplash.com

audio : open source mp3 download from https://www.123rf.com
